Great game for in between and a worthy successor of the first part (which was also fantastic). It takes a little patience and creativity to master the various puzzles and test chambers, but it is definitely worth it. The story is also great, although you don't necessarily have to have played the first part in order to understand the actions. After playing the story there is also the possibility to build test chambers by yourself and to solve them. Furthermore, you can master a series of test chambers together with a friend who also owns the game, which can be a lot of fun too.
I can recommend Portal 2 to everyone who likes tricky and nerve-wracking puzzles but also a good and exciting story. You should also have a little patience and endurance as some puzzles can sometimes be a little frustrating and hard. But it is definitely a great game overall and worth a look.

On top of having puzzles that challenge you to think. It's very tech and sci-fi, very interesting and fun. Lots of people own it, but there are still some who don't. I encourage many to buy this game. It has a good story. And you can even create your own puzzle for others to play. Well worth what it costs.

This game is amazing. I played co-op a while back with my friend on my xbox 360, it was a blast, and we completed all the levels. I recently finally got around to finishing the story mode, and it was a great story with great puzzles. It always felt so good figuring out the puzzles for yourself. The story had a twist(not spoiling it), you probably will see it coming, but the story seems to bulid off of it really well. 


Overall 10/10 would reccomend again.

Портал 2 это отличная игра с офигенной оптимизацией, но с частыми загрузками и сбоями в звуковом кеше. 
В портал 2 Вы найдете : интересный сюжет, приключенческая головоломка, офигенная графика играя на калькуляторе, кооператив. 
Кооператив лучше всего играть с другом, можно по локалке, или через разделённый экран (с двумя контроллерами). Поддерживает Remote Play Together. 
Одна из лучших игр по моему мнению. Всем советую поиграть

This has been a game I replay almost every year, for about 8 years now I believe.
No matter what I always go back to it and I don't think I will ever stop loving it. the characters, the creative puzzles, and the story is what drew me to videogames when I was still learning about this world.
I love also how the community created such wonderful fancreations and they are definitly worth checking out.

Замечательная игра! Лучшая часть из серии Portal. 
Отличная озвучка, интересные тестовые камеры, интересные персонажи.
Теперь подробнее: Начну пожалуй с самих порталов. Голова теперь не кружится (по сравнению с первой частью). 
Графика хорошая, все чётко отрисовано. Помню когда первый раз запустил на своём стареньком компьютере, удивился качеству графики. 
Озвучка отличная, если не считать всякие хрипы и обрывки фраз из предыдущих диалогов. 
Если вкратце, то я бы описал так: "Отличная головоломка с интересным сюжетом".

This review was written right after reviewing Portal 1.

This game is essentially Portal, but even better. Everything that made the first game great is just expanded upon. New mechanics and physics are added that make it not just "more of the same", which would definitely be adequate for me. The Co-op addition and map editor and sharing give it much more replayability, since the community can create new content for the game. I've played a few user-made maps and it's fun to see how differently they're designed compared to the main game. That being said, the level design is phenomenal as always. When it comes to the story, it's definitely more impressive than Portal 1. This time you befriend another AI and together you embark on a quest to dethrone GLaDOS and be free once and for all. It definitely has its touching moments near the end.

The visuals are incredible. Valve outdid themselves again. Portal looked like at least a 2010+ game, but Portal 2 looks at least like a 2013 game. The soundtrack seems more memorable compared to the first game as well, not that this is vital to the experience.

All in all, a terrific game and a great sequel to one of the best games in history (at least in its genre). That being said, Portal was revolutionary for its time introducing very interesting gameplay ideas. This game wasn't as groundbreaking, because it was a sequel. But it did do everything slightly better than the first one, therefore I have to rate it the same in total: 9.5/10.
